评论概述: Very cute but not super supportive
评论详情: If you have a fuller bust you will need a sports bra for working out. I can wear this braless as a going out top as long as I won’t be doing too much dancing.

I was really excited for this top and waited a long time for it to arrive, but was a bit disappointed when I did show up.  The few things I did like about it first. The color is really nice. I love the dark forrest green. The fabric is also a nice buttery soft material that is very stretchy and soft and smooth to the skin. It does have little slits in the bra area where you can remove the padding.  Now what I think could be improved. First it seems a little big in some areas and too small in others making it not very supportive for doing any actual activities other than sitting on the couch. I am petite but busty and I usually wear smalls and mediums in tops so I went with a medium for this knowing I would probably need more room and coverage in the bra section. I found the band portion to be too loose and I was falling out the bottom but the cups section and neckline to be cut too low/small and I was also falling out of the top. The built in bra barely covered enough of my breasts to keep my nipples inside if I got the band completely under my breasts instead of just sitting on top of them. The straps were also too long for me which contributed to the too low neck line. Over all I probably should have gone with a small or even xs to get the right tightness around my ribcage and length of straps, but at that point the cups would have definitely been far, far too small.  I would not recommend this top for anyone who is on the more busty side or for anyone looking for any actual support from this type of top. It would definitely be fine to be a type of top to wear without a bra as an athlesiure style shirt for normal daily activity like shopping or running errands, but I would not try doing any work out activities in this.

评论概述: Great workout top with built in bra

I ordered according to bust size and it fit perfectly! It so flattering and the material is SO comfortable! Will be ordering the other colors!

This is a really good sports bra! I was surprised at the quality and fabric material as they are super soft, perfect stretch, and still provide support. I got my typical size Medium, but it seems it may run a bit large. It fits fine, however for a sports bra I would like a more tighter fit / better sport, so I would definitely size down next time. The bra does come padded, and for the most part the pads stay in place but you can easily move them around and adjust to your fit.
I like this longline bra. It's very comfortable and offers light support. I would not recommend wearing this to workout in, but rather for a leisurely day at home with light activity.

I really really wanted to love this. And I did, except for the fact that it didn’t fit. I should have probably sized up, but I have a dilemma when it comes to my sizing. I am small around the ribs, but large in the chest. I think my size is around a 32H or I style is great. Just needs a little more room in the bust.

The feel of this tank is very nice. It's not a super soft fabric, but it's not too spandex-y feely either. I also love the color (onyx) so much; it's the perfect grey shade.  The bra part is the thing that knocks the tank down for me. The built-in bra part is pretty short, so the balance of making sure the band is under your boobs and the tank not being too low cut is a struggle AND I have really small boobs. I think it's good for casual wear or layering, definitely not for working out.
This sports bra is decent. The material is soft and feels nice against the skin. The sizing is good- it runs true to size. The bra offers a good amount of support while doing different motions.

I love this tank! The fit is perfect, and the material is incredibly comfortable. It’s stretchy and breathable, making it great for workouts or casual wear. The built-in bra offers good support, and the fabric is not see-through, even in white. It washes well and keeps its shape. I highly recommend this tank top for comfort, style, and functionality!

This top is wonderfully soft, it fits awesome, it's so comfy! As other reviews says the cut is pretty low, but it works well for regular wear with average chested women. Athletic activities or larger chested women might not work well with this even though I love the fabric and fit

I love any white top and this one does not disappoint with the built-in tank.  Will likely wear this to travel with a light jacket over as planes can be either really hot or cold and how cute and aesthetic is this?  Love it, the stretch is perfect!

This is a great sports bra. The fabric is amazing, the fit and construction are great, and it is so flattering. I am super impressed with this and liked the bra so much, that I bought the matching leggings. I would give this 10 stars if I could.
Loved the fit and the look. Great material and look. I sized up a little too.

Also, the cups do not hold anything in place so everything was pushing up and out after a few hours of wearing it. I would not recommend this for working out.
